unpublishedAction.name: AddPlatform
jsonPathKeys:
{
    "name": new_name.text,
    "category": new_category.selectedOptionValue,
    "tags": new_tags.selectedOptionValues,
    "maturity": new_maturity.selectedOptionValue,
    "is_open_source": new_opensource.isChecked,
    "website": new_website.text,
		"logo": appsmith.store.logo,
    "has_free_plan": new_freeplan.isChecked,
    "cheapest_price": new_starterprice.text,
    "connects": new_connects.selectedOptionValues
}
